review: great game but the herbalism system is a little too complicated to learn off the bat and as its needed for plot immediately its easy to get in a mess regardless from what ive played id recommend it

a wonderful game the gameplay is engaging and keeps you hooked from beginning to end the soundtrack is excellent and adds a lot to the immersion the story is very well developed and the most fascinating part is that the ending changes based on your choices and perspective throughout the journey its a unique and captivating experience i highly recommend it

this game keeps you on your toes as you explore every bit as you can its a must to try out
all the more surreal if youve actually been to the places the game takes place in

make a sequel and we will buy it awesome voice acting with a very polished world some unnecessary filler including walking sections that were a tad boring but definitely a very good game with an ovwrall enjoyable slow pace to admire the woods to me the story was pretty good but also cliche and expected but the game was awesome and definitely worth a playthrough if youre into this type of walking psychological horror game 810
someday ill return to this game because it was so amazing  great story and the voice acting was great

moving through the world animations  transitions everything is so slow in retrospect the story was interesting but the pacing made me wish for it to end early on solving the puzzles was never gratifying as it never required to actually think all you need to do is just search around to find where to click to activate or pick up stuff  this is a very literal walking simulator if youre really into the genre you might like this game otherwise id suggest to pass this one
great journey

this one is a walking simulator  3d point and click  horror  linear  the horror stuff isnt working for me  the main character is a jerk  but those arent my major gripes  my major gripe is that i find the whole gameplay premise kind of boring

the story is fun and catchy gameplay is good unfortunately i got stuck at herbkit tutorial screen and cant do anything about it even going back to the last checkpoint didnt work same problem happened again so its a lovely game till you need the herbkit
one of the most polished narrative mysteryhorror puzzle games you know the genre lol definitely recommend if you enjoy these type of games
one of the better games i have played this year kudos great game

only 65 reviews seems this game deserves some more attention i really enjoyed this title pretty nice graphics decently interesting story good if sometimes uneven voice acting plus its long took me far longer than i expected out of a game like this well worth the money if youre into this sort of game

very thoughtfully and beautifully crafted narrative everything in the story has purpose meaning or overall contributes to the environment i went back after beating it the first time to unlock another ending and i dont usually give games a second playthrough thoroughly enjoyed the game and felt it was worth paying full price for
fantastic game  great story and beautifully done  puzzles were challenging but not impossible and the game was not  a grind  thanks for  great game

maybe i was expecting more from this game i cant say anything is great besides the graphics the animations are clunky the voice acting is laughable the protagonist is unlikeable maybe its part of the story the story pacing is disgustingly slow the mechanics are so confusing though i praise the devs for giving away the directors cut edition for free if you already have the original

honestly one of the worst single player story games ive played the pacing is absolutely horrendous the voice acting is abysmal just feels generally boring  tedious to play through tried to give it a fair chance but just couldnt deal with it    would only recommend this one if youve been lobotomised

interesting game dialogue can use a bit of polish perhaps a new phone plan for the main character is in order but it definitely is creepy and keeps your attention as long as you like to read many different notes and decifer their messages   it is easy to get lost but that is part of what makes the game challenging   collectibles and achievements are great as well   enjoying it

addresses all the small issues with the original title really looking forward to finishing this second playthrough the game is really old school in a sense it doesnt spoonfeed you the content rather it gives you the tools to explore and there is a lot of things to discover
